cause.description:
You won't suffer or be broken / / You won’t hide or surrender to nothing / / You won’t revolve / / You will evolve / / You won’t forget or give up what you started / / You won’t hide yourself among the weak / / You won’t run away because You know enough to know the way / / You will decide when to stop it / / Begin the R-evolution...Launch forth into the deep.
1. Cuba Libre
cause.name: R-evolution
